-e ---

𐀒 ko 𐘺 •KO 𐀒 Q qooph “monkey(tail)” 𓎼 𓇋 𓆑 / 𓎼 𓄿 𓆑

𐀒 ko Kopf < 󲏩 󲀃 󲈒 󲃢 according to Serra, Soldani

𐘺 •KO 𐀒 ko ≠ 𐀣 qa 𐘌 QA 󲀽 󲀾 𐀑 ki kettle

𔕰 kwi/kwa qui/qua/ que REL relative pronoun

𐀒-𐀪-𐁀-𐀅-𐀙 ko-ri-a2-da-na κορίανδρον coriander
𐀒-𐀩-𐀳 koᵛre-te governor •curator guard KUR

𐀒-𐀺 koʳwo κόρFος > κούρος kouros young man
